Binds with random !M! cards. Would play other binded cards when one of them is played (without cost). Binded cards can't be played by other way.
Exhaust. If the next room can be: NL Treasure or Shop: Gain 20 gold, add Normality at bottom of draw pile. NL Monster: Draw 2 cards. NL ? or Rest: Gain [E] [E] .
column13: Exhaust. If the next room can be: NL Treasure or Shop: Gain 30 gold, add Normality at bottom of draw pile. NL Monster: Draw 3 cards. NL ? or Rest: Gain [E] [E] [E] .
